ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: I can discuss my beliefs with my mother/father without feeling restrained or embarrassed.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Sometimes I have trouble believing everything my mother/father tells me.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father is always a good listener.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am sometimes afraid to ask my mother/father for what I want.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father has a tendency to say things to me that would be better left unsaid.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father can tell how I'm feeling without asking.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am very satisfied with how my mother/father and I talk together.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: If I were in trouble, I could tell my mother/father.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I openly show affection to my mother/father.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When we are having a problem, I often give my mother/father the silent treatment.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am careful about what I say to my mother/father.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When talking to my mother/father, I have a tendency to say things that would be better left unsaid.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When I ask questions, I get honest answers from my mother/father.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father tries to understand my point of view.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: There are topics I avoid discussing with my mother/father.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I find it easy to discuss problems with my mother/father.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: It is very easy for me to express all my true feelings to my mother/father.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father nags/bothers me.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father insults me when s/he is angry with me.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I don't think I can tell my mother/father how I really feel about some things.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Moderately disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Moderately agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Degrees of Openness Score
Notes: Higher score indicates better communication between parent and adolescent; Sum of items: pacs_a_1, pacs_a_3, pacs_a_6, pacs_a_7, pacs_a_8, pacs_a_9, pacs_a_13, pacs_a_14, pacs_a_16, pacs_a_17 OR pacs_p_1, pacs_p_3, pacs_p_6, pacs_p_7, pacs_p_8, pacs_p_9, pacs_p_13, pacs_p_14, pacs_p_16, pacs_p_17

ElementDescription: Extent of Problems Score
Notes: Higher score indicates more problems in the parent-child communication; Sum of items: pacs_a_2, pacs_a_4, pacs_a_5, pacs_a_10, pacs_a_11, pacs_a_12, pacs_a_15, pacs_a_18, pacs_a_19, pacs_a_20 OR pacs_p_2, pacs_p_4, pacs_p_5, pacs_p_10, pacs_p_11, pacs_p_12, pacs_p_15, pacs_p_18, pacs_p_19, pacs_p_20
